Entries.AcceptGift_(O)746: A NEW PET! I SHALL TEACH IT TO BE MORE THAN A ONE-TRICK BONY!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)881: THESE AREN'T VERY FUNNY BONES YOU KNOW.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)820: WHY CAN'T SKELETONS LIVE IN THE MINES?#$e#BECAUSE THEY ONLY GO SIX FEET UNDER!#$e#...ON SECOND THOUGHT, THAT ONE DOESN'T REALLY CHECK OUT.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)581: HMM, THIS ONE DOESN'T LOOK ANYWHERE NEAR AS HUMERUS AS I AM.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)579: THIS ONE MUST HAVE BEEN WORKING WITH A SKELETON CREW.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)821: HMM THIS POOR SAP MUST HAVE BEEN EASY TO FRIGHTEN.#$e#COMPLETELY SPINELESS!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)582: IT'S TOO BAD THIS ONE HAD TO GIVE UP THEIR DREAMS OF JOINING THE ORCHESTRA.#$e#NO ORGAN, YOU SEE.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)823: WHAT DID THE SKELETON SAY INTO THE MEGAPHONE?#$e#MAY I HAVE YOUR ATTEN-SHIN PLEASE!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)584: OH DEAR, IT SEEMS THIS ONE WAS IN A RATHER GRAVE SITUATION.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)822: THIS ONE WAS BONE TO BE WILD!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)824: WHAT'S A SKELETON'S LEAST FAVORITE PLACE TO BE?#$e#THE LIVING ROOM!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)826: WHAT'S A SKELETON'S FAVORITE FRUIT?#$e#A BONE-ANA!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)585: WHAT TYPE OF ART DO SKELETONS ENJOY?#$e#SKULL-PTURES!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)583: WHAT DO YOU CALL A SKELETON THAT COOKS?#$e#A SKULL-INARY GENIUS!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)580: I DON'T REALLY HAVE A BONE TO PICK WITH YOU, TIBIA HONEST.
Entries.rainy: THIS WEATHER SENDS A CHILL DOWN MY SPINE!#$e#WHAT I WOULD GIVE FOR A NICE, WARM BONE-FIRE.
Entries.Mon: PEOPLE KEEP TELLING ME TO USE TROMBONE IN ONE OF MY JOKES, BUT THAT JUST FEELS INSENSITIVE.#$e#SKELETONS DON'T HAVE LUNGS!#$e#NEITHER DO GHOSTS.#$e#OR MUMMIES, FOR THAT MATTER.#$e#OR MUSHROOMS.#$e#...I JUST REALIZED DOUG IS THE ONLY MEMBER OF OUR PARTY WITH LUNGS. I DON'T KNOW HOW TO FEEL ABOUT THAT.
Entries.Tue: HEY, WHY DIDN'T THE SKELETON GO TO THE PARTY?#$e#THEY HAD NO BODY TO GO WITH!#$e#...#$e#WELL EXCUSE ME IF I HAVEN'T GOT A SINGLE FUNNY BONE IN MY BODY!
Entries.Wed: HUMANS ARE SO MARROW-MINDED ABOUT OTHER SPECIES.#$e#I SHOULD NOT NEED AN AMULET TO FLOAT AROUND YOUR KIND.#$e#I'VE BEEN IN THIS VALLEY LONGER THAN ALL OF YOU COMBINED!
Entries.Thu: IF YOU EVER NEED TO CONTACT ME, USE A TELE-BONE!
Entries.Fri: YOU WOULDN'T HAPPEN TO KNOW A GOOD NECROMANCER, WOULD YOU?
Entries.Sat: BE CAREFUL!#$e#I'M BAD TO THE BONE!
Entries.Sun: DO NOT TELL ME ANY FIB-ULAS.#$e#I WASN'T BONE YESTERDAY!
